page.title: 07EDUCATION IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: {CANFORD SCHOOL}is S.of the R. Stour in Canford Magna,it covers an area of 1sq Km.,& is a fee-paying C.of E. Public School.It has 470 boys aged 13-18 yrs & 60 girls aged 16-18 yrs.There are 50 teaching staff inc. the headmaster & l00 ancillary workers.There are l00 day & 400 boarding pupils.The school is run on the house system, 6 boarding and l day,each supervised by a master, his wife,a matron & 2 assistants.Girls were first admitted in l970.There are many facilities inc.2 libraries,heated swimming pool,science lab.,assembly hall,theatre,school of music including concert hall.There are 35 leisure-time clubs.Facilities for every sport,inc.a royal tennis court,the only school in the world to own one.It has its own sanatorium,staffed by 3 nurses.Fees per term-Â£1800 boarding,Â£1260 day.70% of pupils go on to further education.
